DOC.detailed_description: Women seek emergency contraception ( EC ) frequently report multiple recent episode unprotected sex . Although high sensitivity urine pregnancy test effectively rule-out pregnancy result sex occur 14 day ago , clinician frequently concerned pregnancy may result unprotected sex occur < 14 day prior IUD placement . Placement copper IUD within 5 day unprotected sex highly effective form EC . Among 52 Chinese woman report unprotected intercourse 5-7 day prior copper IUD insertion , pregnancy occur . However , effectiveness copper IUD unprotected sex occur 7-14 day prior IUD placement unknown . Intrauterine pregnancies rarely occur copper IUD place . As clinician concerned injure pregnancy occur IUD place , woman unprotected sex 7-14 day prior request IUD placement typically tell must use another , less effective , contraceptive 2+ week return obtain IUD . To remove barrier emergency placement copper IUD , propose study rate pregnancy copper IUD place `` time urine pregnancy test negative . '' We believe simplify guidance regard recommend time copper IUD placement potential significantly increase number woman offer `` same-day '' IUD service .
DOC.criteria: Women age 15 45 year request injectable , subdermal , intrauterine contraception , 614 day unprotected intercourse . History tubal ligation hysterectomy . Positive urine pregnancy test
